content.raw:
I know but that takes 2 clicks and 2 presses on the keyboard and the button takes 1 click.
We might want to add that as a abort option (instead of a button) just like with repeats option of "repeat all" and "repeat last" there could be "abort current" and "abort all". This would reduce GUI clutter and makes sense (at least for me)
